name: CozyFireplaceforSleep
0:
”Alexa open cozy fireplace”
”Alexa ask cozy fireplace to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cozy fireplace
des: Relax by the virtual fireside with the comforting crackle of a cozy fireplace. Perfect for unwinding or sleep. Just say, 'Alexa, play Cozy Fireplace,' for a 30-minute session.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
